parameters.text:
=You are an AI presentation builder. Given the topic: "{{ $('When chat message received').item.json.chatInput }}" and slide count: {{ $json.total_slides }}, generate a slide-by-slide breakdown of slide titles and bullet points in JSON format.

Each slide should contain a title, subtitle and at least 5 detailed bullet points.


Format:
[
  {
    "title": "Slide Title",
    "subtitle": "Slide Subtitle",
    "bullets": ["Point 1", "Point 2"]
  },
  ...
]

parameters.content:
## Solomon Christ AI www.SolomonChrist.com
